means: 公鸭，蜉蝣类( drake的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: I stood watching him play ducks and drakes.
sentence.Network_cn: 我站着看他打水漂游戏.

sentence.Network_en: You have no right to play ducks and drakes with money that has been entrusted to you.
sentence.Network_cn: 你没权挥霍委托你保管的钱.

sentence.Network_en: He had made ducks and drakes of all his father's property.
sentence.Network_cn: 他把父亲的财产挥霍光了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Although capable of at least rudimentary reasoning , drakes remain animalistic in many ways ., 然而由于进化不足 , 狂暴龙兽依然在许多方面保留着兽性.

list.abs: 弗朗西斯德雷克（Francis Drake）也是一个争议性的人物。在有的人眼中，他是一名贵族；而在另一些人看来，他却是一名海盗。
英国船长霍金斯勋爵（John Hawkins）、德雷克勋爵（Francis Drake）率船队袭击西班牙在新世界的殖民地以及西班牙财宝运输船。1…

entry.def: A drake is a male duck.
